adDetails: My name is Steven. I came from China. I can speak Cantonese and Mandarin. I graduated from University of California, Berkeley with a B.S. degree in Civil Engineering in December, 2012. I can provide enthusiastic, high-end service to students and parents. I have been educated in China and the United States. Thus, I can tailor instruction to the needs of the individual learner. Students' achievements: AP Calculus AB student in Castro Valley High School get a 5 in his AP test Calculus I students in Castro Valley High School.(One improve from C to A, another improve from B to A) 7th grade math student and 8th grade math student ( both of them get A in their math class) A student got a C in her Algebra II class before her final. After the tutoring, she got 90% in her final. A physics student in Chabot College got tutoring from me. He improved from a C to a higher B. A student got an A- in Math 1B(calculus II) and a B in Physics 7B student in UC Berkeley. A student passed his online general physics class. A student got an A his pre-cal class( take home online exams) My preferred subjects to tutor include: Algebra, Calculus, Geometry, Pre-Calculus, Trigonometry, Physics, SAT Math and Chinese. I am willing to travel in a radius of up to 25 minutes drive from downtown Oakland. The tutoring rate is $25/hour. If you have any questions, feel free to email me or text me through show contact info
